price: ( ߖߊ߲߰ߞߕߊ ) ߣߌ߲߬ ߕߊ߬ߣߍ߲߬ ߞߏ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߡߊ߬߸ ߊߟߎ߫ ߓߟߏ ߟߎ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߡߍ߲ ߢߍߓߌ߬ߟߊ߬، ߓߊ ߊߟߊ߫ ߕߍ߫ ߓߊ߰ ߟߊ߫ ߖߐ߲߬ ߛߌ߫ ߡߊ߬
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ أَيۡدِيكُمۡ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَيۡسَ بِظَلَّامٖ لِّلۡعَبِيدِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bimā qaddamat aydīkum wa-anna al-laha laysa biẓallāmin lil'ʿabīdi
